# IActionableResult&lt;TValue,TResult&gt;.Ok method

Creates a success result with the given value.

```csharp
public static TResult Ok(TValue value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The value to include in the result. |

## Return Value

A new instance of *TResult* representing a success result with the specified value.
